blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body: As a full-time student, sometimes it gets a little bit tiring dealing with lectures and projects every day. And being a freelancer, I don’t get to write about the things I want to write. I’ve decided to start blogging to be able to share my experiences and have some fun while doing it too.
blogs.author: shinchan

blogs.title: Opening Party
blogs.body: Give yourself time to decide on a date, time, place, and theme. Start talking about the party 2-6 weeks in advance to make sure guests are free. Have food, drinks, and games or activities for guests to enjoy during the party. At the party, be a social butterfly to help create a welcoming atmosphere.
blogs.author: masao
